title: Remarks by President Trump at the Arrival of Prime Minister Borissov of the Republic of Bulgaria – The White House
content:
Remarks			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
November 25, 2019
Rose Garden
2:27 P.M. ESTTHE PRESIDENT:  Treat him well please.  Treat him well.How did you like Conan?  Pretty good, right?Q    Yeah.THE PRESIDENT:  Don’t get in a fight with Conan.  I found that out — you don’t have a chance with Conan, right?  Who would think that?  Not even a chance.  No.  Incredible.Q    Mr. President, do you intend to come to Bulgaria?THE PRESIDENT:  It could happen.  Are you from Bulgaria?Q    Yeah.THE PRESIDENT:  Could happen.Q    When?THE PRESIDENT:  Well, so far, I haven’t been invited, but I think I would be.  He’s a great gentleman.  He’s a —Q    You recently signed Poland into the Visa Waiver Program.  Do you plan to invite Bulgaria also into the —THE PRESIDENT:  Well, I think they’re going to ask for that.  And the relationship is such that could happen.  But I’m going to see you inside.  Okay?
